body:
This bibliography is compiled by geneticists from the journals listed at the end of this publication. It is based on literature entered into our database between 1st June 1995 and 31 st May 1996 (articles are generally added to the database about two and a half months after publication). In addition, the bibliography contains every paper annotated by reviewers; these references were obtained from a variety of bibliographic databases and published between the beginning of the review period and the time of going to press. The bibliography has been grouped into topics that relate to the reviews in this issue.

Papers considered by the reviewers to be of special interest Differentietlon of an Intestinal Epithelial Cell Clone is Regulated by Protein Kinase C. j Bioi Chem 1995. 270: 12536-12541 Bioi Chem 1995, 270:24580-24584 . Dobeshi Y, Kudoh T, Matsumine A, Toyoshima K, Akiyama T: Constitutive Overexpresslon of CDK2 Inhibits Neuronal Differentiation of Rat Pheochromocytoma PC12 Cells. j Bioi Chem 1995, 270:23031-23037 Bioi Chern 1995, 270:24442-24450 Receptor. J Bioi Chem 1995, 270:13869-13878. Control of differentiation by hormones, growth factors, stress etc:. Related reviews: Retinoid receptors in transcriptional regulation (pp 567-574); Roles of the JAK-STAT system in signal transduction via cytokine receptors (pp 587-596)t Abel S, N9uyen MD, Chow W, Theo/09is A: ASC4, a Primary Indoleacetic Acid-responsive Gene Encoding 1-aminocyclopropane-l-carboxylate Synthase in Arabidopsis Thaliana (vol 270, Pg 19093,1995) . J Bioi Chem 1995, 270:26020
